AMERICAN ARCHITECTURAL PRODUCTS CORP., Boardman, Ohio, a maker of windows and doors, said it would close an unprofitable plant in Youngstown, Ohio, and dismiss most of the 100 workers there.
SPARTA FOODS INC., New Brighton, Minn., a maker of tortillas and salsas, agreed to be bought by a shareholder, Cenex Harvest States Cooperatives, for about $14.5 million in cash.

ROBERDS INC., Dayton, Ohio, has hired Deloitte Consulting to study ways to improve the home furnishings retailer's financial condition, including selling the company, closing stores or filing for bankruptcy protection.
